title: Emerald and Diamond Navratna Haaram - A Timeless Elegance
materials: Neelam (11.74 ct). Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting
features: A breathtaking two-layered Haaram, meticulously crafted with a delicate diamond leaf pattern that showcases superior craftsmanship. The pendant features a stunning square-cut Zambian Emerald, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds and the other navaratnas, creating a captivating focal point. The leaf patterns create a light and airy design, perfect for showcasing the radiance of each gemstone.
colors: Primarily gold with a vibrant green Emerald
ruby red and sapphire blue accentuated by the brilliance of white diamonds. This color palette is traditionally considered auspicious and is perfect for any important occasion.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Can also elevate any contemporary outfit for a touch of regal elegance.
description: This exquisite Emerald and Diamond Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern jewelry design. The use of high-quality gemstones, including a significant Zambian Emerald, ensures lasting beauty and value. Its intricate design and Hyderabadi polish reflect a heritage of craftsmanship, making it a treasured heirloom piece. Navratna stones are considered very auspicious and bring good luck. This haaram makes a statement, its elegance never failing to be impressive.
